headline: CSC Digital Brand Services Announces Integration into CrowdStrike Falcon Adversary Intelligence’s Recon to Accelerate Detection and Enforcement Against Malicious Domains
summary: LAS VEGAS, September 15, 2025--CSC, the world’s leading enterprise-class domain registrar and online brand protection provider, announced today at Fal.Con 2025 a new integration of CSC’s domain security offerings with the CrowdStrike Falcon® cybersecurity platform. The integration with Recon, a core capability within Falcon Adversary Intelligence, enables organizations to accelerate the detection and takedown of malicious domains, reducing exposure to phishing, fraud, and brand abuse.

raw.headline: CSC Digital Brand Services Announces Integration into CrowdStrike Falcon Adversary Intelligence’s Recon to Accelerate Detection and Enforcement Against Malicious Domains

The integration with Recon, a core capability within Falcon Adversary Intelligence, enables organizations to accelerate the detection and takedown of malicious domains, reducing exposure to phishing, fraud, and brand abuse.

headline: CrowdStrike Secures the Future of AI Across the Enterprise Ecosystem
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, September 15, 2025--Fal.Con 2025, Las Vegas -- CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced innovations with Amazon Web Services (AWS), Intel, Meta, NVIDIA, and Salesforce to secure the future of enterprise AI. By embedding protection with the world’s AI leaders, CrowdStrike is uniting the ecosystem to innovate with AI, secure AI, and lead cybersecurity into the AI era with the CrowdStrike Falcon® platform.

By embedding protection with the world’s AI leaders, CrowdStrike is uniting the ecosystem to innovate with AI, secure AI, and lead cybersecurity into the AI era with the CrowdStrike Falcon® platform.

headline: Meta Platforms (META) Partners With CrowdStrike For AI-Powered Cybersecurity Benchmark Initiative
summary: Meta Platforms (META) recorded an 8% price increase over the last quarter, amid significant movements in the broader technology market and company-specific events. The company's collaboration with CrowdStrike to launch CyberSOCEval marks an important step in enhancing AI capabilities in cybersecurity. Additionally, the announcement of a cash dividend and their recent joint venture with Reliance Industries for AI solutions signal continued growth and partnership strategies. Meta's expansion...

headline: NinjaOne Now Available for Purchase on the CrowdStrike Marketplace
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, September 15, 2025--NinjaOne®, the automated endpoint management platform, today announced at Fal.Con 2025 that the NinjaOne Platform is now available for purchase in the CrowdStrike Marketplace, the one-stop destination for the world-class ecosystem of CrowdStrike compatible products. With this listing, CrowdStrike Falcon® platform customers can now quickly and easily deploy NinjaOne’s cloud-native solution to automate endpoint management and drive productivity across IT teams.

raw.headline: NinjaOne Now Available for Purchase on the CrowdStrike Marketplace

With this listing, CrowdStrike Falcon® platform customers can now quickly and easily deploy NinjaOne’s cloud-native solution to automate endpoint management and drive productivity across IT teams.

headline: Wipro Targets Rising Cyber Threats With New CrowdStrike Backed Service
summary: Wipro Limited (NYSE:WIT) has expanded its collaboration with CrowdStrike Holdings (NASDAQ:CRWD) to introduce Wipro CyberShieldSM MDR, a managed security service designed to streamline enterprise security operations through artificial intelligence and automation. The new service, unveiled on Monday, integrates CrowdStrike’s Falcon® Next-Gen SIEM with Wipro’s global cybersecurity capabilities. headline: CrowdStrike and Meta Deliver New Benchmarks for the Evaluation of AI Performance in Cybersecurity
summary: AUSTIN, September 15, 2025--Fal.Con 2025, Las Vegas -- CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today, in partnership with Meta, introduced a new suite of benchmarks – CyberSOCEval – for evaluating how AI systems perform in real-world security operations. Built on Meta’s CyberSecEval framework and CrowdStrike’s leading threat intelligence and cybersecurity AI data expertise, this suite of open source benchmarks helps establish a new framework for testing, selecting, and leveraging large language models (LLMs)

headline: Canalys Study Finds Every $1 of Falcon Platform Sales Leads Up to $7 in Partner Services Revenue
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, September 15, 2025--Fal.Con 2025, Las Vegas -- CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced results from an independent study by Canalys, now part of Omdia, showing that partners can generate up to $7 in services revenue for every $1 customers spend on the CrowdStrike Falcon® platform. This return represents the strongest cybersecurity partner ecosystem multiplier on record, illustrating the generational ecosystem significance of the Falcon platform.

This return represents the strongest cybersecurity partner ecosystem multiplier on record, illustrating the generational ecosystem significance of the Falcon platform.

headline: Versa Announces New Integrations with CrowdStrike Falcon Platform
summary: LAS VEGAS, September 15, 2025--Fal.Con 2025 – Versa, the global leader in Universal Secure Access Service Edge (SASE), today announced new integrations with the CrowdStrike Falcon® platform at Fal.Con 2025. Now available in the CrowdStrike Marketplace, the integrations – including support for Falcon® Next-Gen SIEM – help customers strengthen Zero Trust access and give security operations center (SOC) teams unified endpoint and network visibility to detect and stop threats.

raw.headline: Versa Announces New Integrations with CrowdStrike Falcon Platform
raw.summary: LAS VEGAS, September 15, 2025--Fal.Con 2025 – Versa, the global leader in Universal Secure Access Service Edge (SASE), today announced new integrations with the CrowdStrike Falcon® platform at Fal.Con 2025. Now available in the CrowdStrike Marketplace, the integrations – including support for Falcon® Next-Gen SIEM – help customers strengthen Zero Trust access and give security operations center (SOC) teams unified endpoint and network visibility to detect and stop threats.

headline: Wipro Partners with CrowdStrike to Deliver AI-Powered Unified Security Services
summary: EAST BRUNSWICK, N.J. & BENGALURU, India, September 15, 2025--Wipro Limited today announced partnership with CrowdStrike to launch Wipro CyberShield℠ MDR, an AI-powered unified managed security service.

headline: 3 Large-Cap Stocks to Consider Right Now
summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.
